page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE IN EDDERTON
page.content: In the morning I wake up about 8.00 am.I go down stairs and get dressed.After that I go and get my breakfast which is usually a cereal. I wash my self and brush my teeth.My mam brushes my hair for me because l cannot reach the back.After I get my school bag packed.I go to see my pony.Usually by the time I have fed him the school bus has arrived.The time is about 9.05 a.m,by the time we pick up some other pupils the time will be 9.20 a.m.I get out of school at 3.40 p.m.About 20 minutes later the bus comes and takes me home.When I get home I run in the door and watch T.V until supper.After supper I usually go up stairs to my bedroom and listen to some music.Then I go out and ride my pony until 8.00 p.m which is bed time for me.I read a book and then I sleep.
